title: Linux readelf Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the readelf command in Linux, learn how to analyze ELF file headers and sections, and gain practical experience with real-world examples.

meta.title: Linux readelf Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the readelf command in Linux, learn how to analyze ELF file headers and sections, and gain practical experience with real-world examples.
meta.keywords: Linux, readelf, ELF, file analysis, scripting, programming

steps.title: Understand the Purpose and Functionality of the readelf Command

verify.name: Verify the readelf command output
verify.hint: Ensure that the `readelf -h /bin/ls` command displays the ELF header information as shown in the example output.

steps.title: Explore the Basic Usage of the readelf Command

verify.name: Verify the readelf command options
verify.hint: Ensure that the `readelf --help` command displays the expected help information, including the description for the `-h` option to display the ELF file header.

verify.name: Verify the readelf command output for sections
verify.hint: Ensure that the `readelf -S /bin/ls` command displays the section headers of the `/bin/ls` ELF file.

steps.title: Analyze ELF File Headers and Sections Using readelf

verify.name: Verify the readelf command output for ELF header
verify.hint: Ensure that the `readelf -h /bin/ls` command displays the ELF header information as shown in the example output.

verify.name: Verify the readelf command output for sections
verify.hint: Ensure that the `readelf -S /bin/ls` command displays the section headers of the `/bin/ls` ELF file.
